course_description: This course seeks to explore questions at the intersection of Christian sacramental liturgy and architecture, from historical, anthropological, and theological perspectives. We will study how Christians have understood the nature and function of their worship, how they have used architectural spaces for their liturgical purposes, and which role gender has played in this context.
